approval.addGuardianText: Other added guardians may be contacted in matters concerning the child.
approval.approvedMessage: Thank you for confirming youth service membership.
approval.approverInfoText: Guardian may be contacted concerning the child.
approval.approveTerms: I have read <0>the privacy policy of this service</0>, <1>the privacy policy of Helsinki profile</1> and <2>the city's data protection principles</2>. I can be contacted using the information I have given.
approval.explanationError: You have either already approved the application submitted by your youth or an error has occurred in our service.
approval.explanationCheckStatus: The youth can check his application status by logging in to Jässäri. Ask him to resend the confirmation message if his membership has not yet been approved.
approval.formExplanationText_1: has sent a membership application for the City of Helsinki’s Youth Services for your approval. The membership is free of charge. If you approve the application,
approval.formExplanationText_2: may visit Youth Centres and participate in fun activities. The activities at Youth Centres are instructed by trained youth workers.  If the information is incorrect, ask the young person to change it and send a new verification message to you.
approval.name: Name
approval.photoUsageApprovedText: The young person may be photographed and the photos may be used in the printed and electronic communications and marketing of the City of Helsinki. The City will not pay compensation for photographing and using the photos. The right to use the photos will remain in effect until further notice, and it concerns all communications and marketing communications of the City of Helsinki.
approval.title: Please approve membership

deviceTimeError.message: Believe it or not, but we can’t allow you to log in because the clock on your device is off by more than five minutes. Please set the time and try again.

permRequestDenied.message: You need to approve our request to access your Tunnistamo profile in order to use this service. Please try logging in again.

authentication.errorMessage: An error occured while logging in. Please try again

confirmSendingProfile.helpText: Your membership application has been sent to
confirmSendingProfile.sendAgainHelpText: Approval email has been re-sent to
confirmSendingProfile.title: The application has been sent to your guardian for approval!

login.findNearestService: Find the nearest youth centre on the service map
login.helpText: Jässäri gives you access to the Youth Services’ activities. With Jässäri membership, you can participate in fun activities, hang out at Youth Centres, join hobby groups, courses and camps, apply for project subsidies or even produce your own event! The activities at Youth Centres are instructed by trained youth workers.
login.helpTextUnderAge: Unfortunately, you need to be at least 13 years old to get a digital Jässäri. You can download an application form from here.
login.linkForMembersText: Do you have membership? Log in
login.title: Get your Jässäri!

The City will not pay compensation for photographing and using the photos. The right to use the photos will remain in effect until further notice, and it concerns all communications and marketing communications of the City of Helsinki.

membershipDetails.title: Own information

meta.description: Jässäri gives you access to the Youth Services’ activities. With Jässäri membership, you can participate in fun activities, hang out at Youth Centres, join hobby groups, courses and camps, apply for project subsidies or even produce your own event! The activities at Youth Centres are instructed by trained youth workers.

notification.defaultErrorText: Something went wrong. Try again after a while.

registration.ageRestriction: Jässäri is only for youths between 8-29 years.
registration.approverInfoOver18Text: For members over 18, we don't require providing custodian contact information. If for any reason you wish us to be able to contact them, you can add the information here.
registration.approverInfoText: A confirmation request concerning your membership will be sent to this address, and your guardian must verify the information and approve your membership.
registration.approveTerms: I have read <0>the privacy policy of this service</0>, <1>the privacy policy of Helsinki profile</1> and <2>the city's data protection principles</2>. I can be contacted using the information I have given.
registration.confirmSend: Accept the terms and send the application
registration.membershipInfoText: Membership is free and does not require anything of you, but you do need a membership to be able to participate in activities at Youth Centres. We will not disclose your information to third parties. You have the right to check and remove the information we have stored concerning you. Please remember that intoxicants are not allowed at Youth Centre activities.
registration.photoUsageApprovedText: I can be photographed and the photos may be used in the printed and electronic communications and marketing of the City of Helsinki. The City will not pay compensation for photographing and using the photos. The right to use the photos will remain in effect until further notice, and it concerns all communications and marketing communications of the City of Helsinki.
registration.processInfoText: A data verification request will be sent to the parent and once they have reviewed and approved the information, your membership will take effect.
registration.title: Please fill in your information
registration.addGuardianText: If necessary other guardians may be contacted in matters relating to your youth membership.

tos.title: Terms of Service

emailApproval.heading: {{ youth_profile.profile.first_name }} has sent a membership application for the City of Helsinki’s Youth Services for your approval.
emailApproval.content:
Hi {{ youth_profile.approver_first_name }},

{{ youth_profile.profile.first_name }} has sent a membership application for the City of Helsinki’s Youth Services for your approval. The membership is free of charge. If you approve the application, {{ youth_profile.profile.first_name }} may visit Youth Centres and enjoy fun benefits. If the information is incorrect, ask the youth to change it and send a new approval request to you. You can give your approval using the Jässäri service via this link:

https://jassari.hel.fi/approve/{{ youth_profile.approval_token }}

This message was sent automatically from our system. Please do not reply to this message as the replies will not be processed.

emailApproved.heading: {{ youth_profile.approver_first_name }} has approved your Youth Services membership
emailApproved.content:
Welcome to the Youth Services of the City of Helsinki! {{ youth_profile.approver_first_name }} has approved your membership. Your digital membersip card can be found here:

https://jassari.hel.fi

emailRenew.heading:
Hi {{ youth_profile.profile.first_name }}! Your Youth Services membership is about to expire You can easily renew your membership here https://jassari.hel.fi/

For more information on the Youth Services membership and its perks, please visit http://jassari.munstadi.fi/en/

This message was sent automatically from our system. Please do not reply to this message as the replies will not be processed.

Hei {{ youth_profile.approver_first_name }},

{{ youth_profile.profile.first_name }} on pyytänyt sinua vahvistamaan nuorisojäsenyytensä. Käy antamassa vahvistus Jässäri-palvelussa käyttäen tätä linkkiä:

https://jassari.test.kuva.hel.ninja/approve/{{ youth_profile.approval_token }}

Tämä viesti on lähetetty järjestelmistä automaattisesti. Älä vastaa tähän viestiin, sillä vastauksia ei käsitellä.
